requestId.description: requestId: the identifier of the request provided by the client; shall be unique within a given DOIP session so clients can distinguish between DOIP service responses. The requestId shall be a string not exceeding 4096 bits.

clientId.description: clientId: the identifier of the client.

targetId.description: targetId: the identifier of the DO on which the operation is to be invoked; the DOIP service could itself be the target.

operationId.description: operationId: the identifier of the operation to be performed.

authentication.description: authentication: optional JSON object used by clients to authenticate.

description: An operation to remove the target DO from the management of the DOIP service.
